snippet: 76ers guard Jason Richardson will miss the rest of the season with a knee injury.
abstract: Philadelphia 76ers guard Jason Richardson will miss rest of NBA season with knee injury; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: 76ers guard Jason Richardson will miss the rest of the season with a knee injury.

headline.seo: 76ers’ Jason Richardson Out for Season With Knee Injury
headline.main: 76er Is Out for Season With Injury
